T02D3684:314a-1: t'a ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D3684:314a-3: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3684:314a-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3684:314a-5: de la dang por 'di bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D3684:314a-6: dben pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3684:314a-7: mchod pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa bsham zhing /
T02D3684:314a-8: gtor ma gcig kyang bshams la /
T02D3684:314a-9: aom a'a:h'um zhes byin gyis brlabs /
T02D3684:314a-10: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'at aom a'a:h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02D3684:314a-12: de nas rang nyid sgrol mar mos par byas la /
T02D3684:314a-13: de'i snying gar padma sna tshogs su yod pa /
T02D3684:314a-14: dbus kyi lte ba la aa las zla ba la t'am ljang gu /
T02D3684:314a-15: de'i 'od kyis rang bzhin gyi gnas nas rdo rje'i sgrol ma mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la /
T02D3684:314a-18: de nas me tog la sogs pa lnga dbul /
T02D3684:314a-20: rjes su yi rang ba dang bsngo ba bya gsum la skyabs su 'gro /
T02D3684:314a-21: de nas bdag rje btsun ma sgrol ma dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig par bsam /
T02D3684:314a-22: de nas slar gshegs su gsol /
T02D3684:314a-23: sems can gyi don bya snyam pa'i byams pa /
T02D3684:314a-24: 'khor ba nas sems can rang rang gi sdug bsngal yod pa la snying rje bsgom /
T02D3684:314a-25: de rnams sdug bsngal las thar nas sangs rgyas kyi bar la dga' ba bsgom /
T02D3684:314b-0: de yang sems can de dag kun @314b stong pa dang rang bzhin med par btang snyoms bsgom /
T02D3684:314b-1: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3684:314b-2: zhes mi rtog pa cig bsgom /
T02D3684:314b-3: de nas rtog pa 'phro ba 'am bying na stong pa mi rtog pa'i ngang las /
T02D3684:314b-4: pam las sna tshogs padma de'i lte ba la aa
T02D3684:314b-5: las zla ba de'i steng du t'am ljang gu de
T02D3684:314b-6: las autpal / de ltar autpal t'am gis mtshan pa
T02D3684:314b-7: yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid sgrol ma sku
T02D3684:314b-8: mdog ljang gu padma dang zla ba'i gdan la phyed
T02D3684:314b-9: krung gis skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D3684:314b-11: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya /
T02D3684:314b-12: g-yon autpal snyan gyi thad kar bzung ba /
T02D3684:314b-13: dbu rgyan dang snyan cha dang mgul rgyan dang /
T02D3684:314b-18: bag tsam g-yas su 'gying ba 'od zer sngo ljang dang bcas par bsgoms la /
T02D3684:314b-19: thugs ka'i t'am las 'od zer 'phros te ye shes
T02D3684:314b-20: kyi sgrol ma spyan drangs lam du bzhugs pa la
T02D3684:314b-21: sngar bstan pa'i mchod pa rnams yid kyis phul /
T02D3684:314b-22: de nas bdag la gzhug / yang t'am gi 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3684:314b-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs /
T02D3684:314b-24: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol la ;
T02D3684:314b-25: sngar gyi mchod pa yid kyis phul la /
T02D3684:314b-26: de rnams bdag la dbang stsol cig par bsgom /
T02D3684:314b-27: de yang bum pa lnga bcud dang bcas pa lha mo lngas dbang bskur nas /
T02D3684:314b-28: bum pa'i chu de mar blugs pas sgrib pa byang /
T02D3684:314b-29: yar 'khyil bas spyi bor don yod grub pa bzhugs par bsam /
T02D3684:314b-30: de nas mi rtog pa cung zad bsgom /
T02D3684:314b-31: shes pa 'phro ba'am bying ba na lha'i sku rim gyis bsam /
T02D3684:314b-32: de nas snying padma 'dab ma brgyad la /
T02D3684:314b-33: dbus kyi zla ba la aom /
T02D3684:314b-41: nub byang du sv'a h'a bkod la rim pas bzlas so //
T02D3684:314b-42: lag pa autpa la'i phreng ba bgrang ngo //
T02D3684:314b-43: brgya'am stong bzlas la 'phro gcod tsam na /
T02D3684:314b-44: ye shes pa nam mkha' la bton la /
T02D3684:315a-0: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba @315a * //
T02D3684:315a-1: 'dis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T02D3684:315a-2: sems can thams cad kyi don byed par gyur cig
T02D3684:315a-3: / bdag sangs rgyas ma thob par la theg pa
T02D3684:315a-5: sems can gyi don byed par gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02D3684:315a-7: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dha byang chub sems dpa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3684:315a-9: // / pandi ta ta th'a ga ta rakshi ta dang /
